name: Russell CARROLL v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (UNIVERSITY OF PENNSYLVANIA), Appeal of University of Pennsylvania
name_abbreviation: Carroll v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: Russell CARROLL v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (UNIVERSITY OF PENNSYLVANIA), Appeal of University of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Brian Joseph Smith, Esq., for University of Pennsylvania.
James A. Holzman, Esq., Amber M. Kenger, Esq., for Worker’s Compensation Appeal Board.

casebody.head_matter:
782 A.2d 510
Russell CARROLL v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (UNIVERSITY OF PENNSYLVANIA), Appeal of University of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted on Briefs March 28, 2001.
Decided Oct. 17, 2001.
Brian Joseph Smith, Esq., for University of Pennsylvania.
James A. Holzman, Esq., Amber M. Kenger, Esq., for Worker’s Compensation Appeal Board.
George Dallis Walker, Ésq., Larry Pitt, Esq., for Russell Carroll.
